page.title: 15The Village Fete
page.content: The village fete was held on 22nd June in Mrs.Underwood's garden in the centre of the village.It started with normal games and stalls including Groceries, Bottles,Raffle and the Wheel of Fortune.Later on Punch and Judy came and whilst this was happening some of our class was getting ready to do some Morris Dancing.After the Punch and Judy had finished we did the Morris Dancing, it all went well.After this I went to watch Tim Pepper in the stocks being soaked.I had two goes on the Lucky Dip and three goes on the Wheel of Fortune. Earlier on we had the prizes for the pub sign competition.I came third and won 25p.Soon I had to go home and I had enjoyed myself a lot.The money raised goes towards paying for things in the village. Johnathan Gillespie.
